name: JSONParser_getJSONIntValueTest
description: Unit tests for the JSONParser.getJSONIntValue method, which retrieves integer values from JSON strings.

test_cases.name: testGetJSONIntValueSuccess
test_cases.description: Tests the successful retrieval of an integer value from a valid JSON string.

test_cases.name: testGetJSONIntValueThrowException
test_cases.description: Tests that the method throws a JSONException when attempting to retrieve an integer value using an invalid key.

test_cases.name: testGetJSONIntValueWithInvalidJson
test_cases.description: Tests that the method throws a JSONException when provided with an invalid JSON string.

test_cases.name: testGetJSONIntValueWithNonIntValue
test_cases.description: Tests that the method throws a JSONException when attempting to retrieve an integer value from a JSON string where the value is not an integer.
